source.8f310d80:
%%time
env = make("lux_ai_2021", configuration={"loglevel": 0, "annotations": False}, debug=False)
trainer = env.train([None, "simple_agent"])
obs = trainer.reset()
eps = 1
maxstep=10000
print("=== Episode {} ===".format(eps))
for i in range(maxstep + 1):
    action = ['m u_1 n']
    obs, reward, done, info = trainer.step(action)
    if done:
        env = make("lux_ai_2021", configuration={"loglevel": 0, "annotations": False}, debug=False)
        trainer = env.train([None, "simple_agent"])
        obs = trainer.reset()
        eps += 1
        print("=== Episode {} ===".format(eps))
source.6dee5452:
%%time
env = make("lux_ai_2021", configuration={"loglevel": 2, "annotations": True}, debug=True)
trainer = env.train([None, "simple_agent"])
obs = trainer.reset()
eps = 1
maxstep=10000
print("=== Episode {} ===".format(eps))
for i in range(maxstep + 1):
    action = ['m u_1 n']
    obs, reward, done, info = trainer.step(action)
    if done:
        env = make("lux_ai_2021", configuration={"loglevel": 2, "annotations": True}, debug=True)
        trainer = env.train([None, "simple_agent"])
        obs = trainer.reset()
        eps += 1
        print("=== Episode {} ===".format(eps))
